mapper.select:
SELECT A.menu_cd AS "id" , CASE WHEN A.menu_prnt_cd = 'ROOT' THEN '#' ELSE A.menu_prnt_cd END AS "parent" , A.menu_nm AS "text" , A.menu_tp AS "menuTp"
, CASE WHEN B.menu_cd IS NULL THEN '' WHEN A.menu_tp IN ('R','D') THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_menu WHERE menu_cd LIKE CONCAT(A.menu_cd,'%') AND menu_cd != A.menu_cd AND site_gb_cd = 'SG0001') > 0 THEN '' ELSE 'selected' END END AS "state"
, '' AS "state"
FROM tb_menu A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth_grp_menu B ON B.menu_cd = A.menu_cd AND B.site_gb_cd = A.site_gb_cd
AND B.auth_grp_cd = #{auth_grp_cd}
WHERE A.site_gb_cd = 'SG0001' ORDER BY A.menu_cd ASC, A.menu_prnt_cd ASC, A.menu_ord ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_auth_grp_menu (auth_grp_cd, menu_cd, site_gb_cd, ent_dttm, upt_user_id) VALUES(#{auth_grp_cd}, #{menu_cd}, #{site_gb_cd}, NOW(), #{menu_cd})
